results.title: Next of kin
results.creator_credit: Tony Williams, Robert Le Tet, The Film House and SIS Productions
results.brief_description: A young woman inherits an old people’s home and finds that its inmates are becoming the victims of a mad killer.

results.title: Norman Loves Rose
results.creator_credit: Henri Safran, Basil Appleby, Norman Films and Direct Hit Productions
results.brief_description: Norman is a sensitive, precocious 13 year old preparing for his formal entry into Jewish manhood, the bar mitzvah. He is also passionately in love with his sister-in-law, Rose, who is pregnant. Stars Carol Kane, Tony Owen with Barry Otto, Sandy Gore and Warren Mitchell.

results.title: Crimes of the Heart
results.creator_credit: Ken Adam, Bruce Beresford, Freddie Fields and De Laurentiis Entertainment Group
results.brief_description: Unconventional comedy in which three writers reunite and share their problems, eccentricities and idiosyncrasies during a reunion. The youngest has just been released from prison after shooting her husband because he beat up her black lover. During their time together assorted family secrets are revealed. Based on play of the same name by Beth Henley, which won a Pulitzer Prize. Stars Diane Keaton, Jessica Lange and Sissy Spacek.

results.title: One night stand
results.creator_credit: John Duigan, Simon Wincer, Richard Mason and Astra Film Productions
results.brief_description: On the eve of World war three a group of young people find themselves in the deserted Sydney Opera House. As they hear that war has broken out in Europe and heads for Australia, the four spend what may be their last New Year’s Eve amusing themselves and growing closer in friendship. Cast: Tyler Coppin, Cassandra Delaney, Jay Hackett, Saskia Post, Midnight Oil.

results.title: Oz: A Rock 'n' Roll Road Movie
results.creator_credit: Chris Lofven, Lyne Helms and Count Features
results.brief_description: An Australian rock movie fable. Dorothy’s teenage quest in the Australia of the 70’s is a modern parable set to Ross Wilson’s music. With three weird friends who alternate between being pals and making passes, Dorothy sets out to find the answer to fame and fortune’s riddle at the hands of the wonderful wizard.

results.title: Petersen
results.brief_description: Petersen is an electrician and former football star who yearns to be a teacher, so he attends university. But it’s the female professors, students, and all the women he comes in contact with who learn a thing or two from him. Stars Jack Thompson, Jacki Weaver and Wendy Hughes.

results.title: Race for the Yankee Zephyr
results.creator_credit: David Hemmings, FGH Film Consortium and Endeavour Productions
results.brief_description: Set in New Zealand’s South Island, this film is about several men who learn of a wrecked DC-3 plane, that crashed in 1944 carrying $50,000,000 in gold. As they make plans to retrieve the loot, one man prepares to get it all for himself. Stars Ken Wahl, Lesley Ann Warren and Donald Pleasence.

results.title: The Black stallion
results.creator_credit: Carroll Ballard, Francis Ford Coppola, Omni Zoetrope and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: A young boy is saved from a devastating shipwreck by a beautiful black stallion. Together they survive on an isolated island, an experience that creates a lasting bond between them. After their rescue, they return to America where they meet Henry Dailey (Mickey Rooney) an irascible ex-jockey and horse trainer. Dailey is quick to realise the racing potential of the stallion and teaches the boy to be a jockey. Based on the novel by Walter Farley the film stars Kelly Reno, Mickey Reno and Teri Garr.

results.title: The Holy Innocents = Los Santos Inocentes
results.creator_credit: Mario Camus, Julian Mateoas and Ganesh
results.brief_description: The Holy innocents is a poignant rural drama zeroing in on the abysmal class differences still existing in some sections of modern Spain, especially in the holdings of the rural aristocracy. The story concerns an impoverished family working on the estate of an aristocratic family in the province of Extramaduna in the 1960s. Each of the members of the poor family is spotlighted for a part of the film.

results.title: What Happened to Kerouac?
results.brief_description: This film is a fascinating portrait of Jack Kerouac, the author of “On the road” and reluctant King of the Beat Generation. Includes interviews with family members and cronies including Allen Ginsberg, William Burroughs and Edie Kerouac Parker. This film is a candid and moving biography of one of America’s most influential authors. It is a terrifying and exhilarating film about a troubled genius whose influence is still being felt all over the world.
